item.title: Kubernetes Basics
item.description: Using Minikube to Create a Cluster Kubernetes Clusters Kubernetes coordinates a highly available cluster of computers that are connected to work as a single unit. applications need to be packaged in a way that decouples them from individual hosts: they need to be containerized.
